Description:
Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited (BGSW) is a 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. We are one of the world’s leading global suppliers of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT, and Business Solutions.With a global footprint and presence in US, Europe, Japan, China, and the Asia Pacific region, we are at the forefront of designing, developing, and executing IoT ecosystems through our all-encompassing capability within the 3 aspects of IoT – Sensors, Software, and Services.We have always focused on improving the quality of the life of people, providing newer revenue-generating opportunities, and improving operational efficiencies for enterprises through an array of solutions. With our unique ability to offer end-to-end solutions that connect Sensors, Software, and Services, we enable businesses to move from the traditional to digital, or improve businesses by introducing a digital element in their products and processes.The positionIn order to get closer to our vision of accident-free driving, we are developing safe and high-quality software and system solutions. As part of our team, you will be part of our journey in creating a new world of assisted and automated driving. As part of our international and diverse global team, you will paly a key role in the development of base software for next generation of vehicles. You will be taking ownership of key aspects of SW development and drive high quality deliveries.As part of our team, you will have the opportunity to influence the development of high-resolution sensors: Radars & Video cameraYou will have opportunity to learn and contribute to high-quality driving assistance systems. In addition, you will have the opportunity to influence engineering experts of tomorrow by coaching and mentoring.ResponsibilitiesTakes responsibility: you will be responsible for COM stack implementation based on the AUTOSAR
Create and maintain technical specification of components. If necessary, work in close collaboration with architect, function developers, product owner and other stakeholders to clarify and understand requirements
You design and develop system- and hardware-related software components in C++ in compliance with current guidelines and standards, carry out analyses and reviews as well as the implementation of fully automated, High-performance unit tests based on model or target platform
Shall be using innovative ideas and concepts to solve/implement customer requirements.
Proactively highlight technical challenges and actively contribute to deriving solutions and ensure prioritization for timely implementation with product owner
You will be responsible for maintaining high quality of SW documentation for the components developed
Ensure end to end deliveries with respect to the team delivery scope. Provide those deliveries in a self-organized manner. Support team members in developing necessary skills to be able to deliver value
You will also be part of an international team, working closely within platform development and coordinating collaboration with internal and external development partners.Mandatory requirements (Skills)6+ years of total experience in automotive SW development
3 to 4 years’ hands-on experience in AUTOSAR Communication stack implementation
Personality: You are communicative, team-oriented and characterized by a structured and solution-oriented way of working combined with a high-quality awareness and independence. Attentive to details and self-motivated
Working method: Analytical, methodical, independent and responsible.
Experience and know-how
Expertise in C++ programming must. very good knowledge in the area of object-oriented SW designs and design samples
Good programming and debugging skills in communication protocol like CAN, CAN FD, Ethernet and related tools
Experience in requirement analysis, design, implementation and testing of automotive SW
Hands-on experience in development tools like Compiler, Emulator, Debugger, CANoe, CANape, CANAlyzer, HIL and etc.
Experience with DOORSB.E/B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Computer science, Electronics and Communication, Mechatronics, Electrical, InstrumentationAdditional InformationPassionate at Automotive engineering
Strong analytical and diagnostic skills
Ability to work independently and as a part of a team
Able to apply test driven development concepts and design / development tools as required
Goal oriented, team player, focus on quality 
Knowledge / experience with Quality process such as ASPICE
Good communication (verbal and written) skills and interpersonal skills 
Goal oriented, team player, willingness to take higher responsibility
Agile Mindset
Scripting language knowledge is beneficial (e.g. Python, CAPL)
Experience of working on adaptive AUTOSAR and using agile practices and sw development process, methods will be added advantageJob Details
